body: mutation {updateusersetting (usersetting: {id: "super.user@test.com", timezone:"Europe/Belgrade", language: "English", column_preferences:["test_preference"] notifications: [ { name: "six", receive: true }, { name: "email", receive: true, data: "super.user@test.com" } ]}) { id, work_phone, cell_phone, timezone, language, column_preferences, notifications { name, receive, data }, created_at, updated_at } }
